text: it finally feels like the world cup is
here this treat in the Flamengo
neighborhood of Rio has started to be
decorated by the residents this is a
very strong tradition in Brazil it's
always very colorful in the streets
before the world cup but this year
things have been different it's been the
talk of the town that people aren't as
excited as a result of a more negative
mood people being very critical of the
World Cup people here decided to
decorate the streets even so but wanted
to incorporate some of this critical
feeling this is a good example the World
Cup trophy with a big dollar sign right
in the middle this is one of the
organizers painting with his family
hodgen AP euro IDs what's different this
year with all the criticism to the World
Cup quad difference edition o como todos
escrito zakappa anivia da alegria defeat
a huge acoustical copa de bunda mismo
mais as pessoas moonstone leonardo kita
contestando mood police con ella scary
demonstrates myself a sample just my
gosh rubicon hello America papadum una
silla he says are still all the joy of
decorating street it's still there but
people don't are not ignoring what's
happening in the political scenario they
also want to express their anger at the
problems in Brazil all the residents
here chipped in to buy the decorations
for the street there's almost 2,000
Brazilian Flags hanging over the street
and this is happening elsewhere but the
criticism is also happening in several
parts of the country anti world cup
paintings appearing on streets and on
all and on walls all over the place so
it's definitely a world cup with a
different taste this time in Brazil
